rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A wide-open entrance with a reception area, incorporating Vastu by aligning the door to the east for auspiciousness.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living space featuring exposed concrete structures and large windows on the south side to maximize natural light. The room is designed in line with Vastu's emphasis on the South-West direction for wealth.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with dining area. Positioned in the northeast to enhance positivity as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the pool area. Designed using Brutalist elements and aligning with Vastu principles for relaxation in the northwest direction.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space, ensuring quiet environment; positioned away from high traffic areas and aligned with Vastu guidelines to avoid disturbances.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main entrance is oriented towards the east in accordance with Vastu for positive energy influx.

openings.name: Window to Living Room
openings.description: Large window providing ample natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance
openings.description: Provides access to the swimming pool area on the plot. Designed with minimal openings to maintain privacy.

exterior_features.name: Swimming Pool
exterior_features.description: A dedicated swimming pool integrated into the design for recreation and relaxation. Placed in the northeast to balance Vastu energies.

levels.notes: The apartment layout is designed as a split-level bachelor pad. The design incorporates local building norms, Brutalist aesthetics, and Vastu-compliant principles ensuring energy flow and auspicious directions.
